programme.title: The Lion Guard
programme.desc: Childrens series - Ep. 32. Kion, the fearless and rebellious lion cub, son of Simba and Nala, is the prince of the Proud Land. Born soon after his sister, Kiara, he becomes the leader of the Lion Guard.

programme.title: Jazz à Vienne
programme.desc: A number of spellbinding performances from Jazz à Vienne, a well-known Jazz Festival that takes place annually, in France. Every evening there are concerts in the ancient Roman theater of Vienne. Among the performers there have been musicians such as Miles Davis, Stan Getz, Michel Petrucciani, Ella Fitzgerald, and many more. In addition to the main concerts there are smaller ones on other stages in the city, and in pubs and musical moves.

programme.title: The making of Omara
programme.desc: Join us for an insightful look at the creative process of saxophonist Michael Blicher, organist Dan Hemmer, and drummer Steve Gadd as they craft the repertoire for their acclaimed 2016 album "Omara." Following in the footsteps of legendary organists like Jimmy Smith, Shirley Scott, and Jimmy McGriff, organist Dan Hemmer and his two musical peers prove that the organ trio format continues to be a force to be reckoned with in jazz and beyond. The album "Omara," recorded live during their 2016 tour of Germany, England and Denmark, captures the trios unique blend of jazz, soul, and blues in performance at some of Europes most intimate jazz clubs. Witness the passion, dedication, and inspiration that led to this wonderful album in Blicher Hemmer Gadd - The Making of "Omara".

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Live at the Metro Theatre
programme.desc: Public Enemy, also known as PE, is an influential hip hop group from Long Island, New York, known for its politically charged lyrics, criticism of the media, and active interest in the concerns of the African American community. In 2004, Rolling Stone Magazine ranked Public Enemy number forty-four on its list of the Immortals: 100. Here, the group performs at The Metro Theatre, in Sydney, Australia, on December 27, 2008.

programme.title: Rebirth
programme.desc: Amsterdam, February 6th, 2018 - The short documentary Rebirth in The Amsterdam Red Light District illustrates how brutal Richard Lems life as an addict was and his struggle to unshackle himself from the shame. Filled with fierce, freighting, and sad moments, Richard relives his stabbing, stay in jail, drug test, and drug use. Richard expresses himself verbally but mainly relives the moments through drumming, which renders the documentary an intense and unique experience. Addiction doctor and musician Gerard Alderliefste: "If he dares to bottom out, he will see it was the drugs and not himself. Music can bring those emotions to the surface".

programme.title: Les McCann
programme.sub-title: Les McCann: Live in New Orleans
programme.desc: Autodidact Les McCann became an international jazz star he is today after the release of his album "Swiss Movement" in 1968 which was recorded with Eddie Harris. However this musician has many other sides of achievements than that one record such as; McCann effortlessly switched between styles and stood his ground in every role from bop to fusion, from vocals to electric piano and clavinet to synthesizer, his is mix of church music and swing fits perfectly in the spirit of his time although at one point within the 90s he was only able to play with a single finger due to his illness. In todays broadcast, McCann brings gospel back to the New Orleans where this set was played in 1983. McCanns vocals triumph in the soulful performance of many of his hits, including Just Like Magic. He is accompanied by his fantastic "Magic Band" consisting of saxophonist Bobby Bryant Jr., bassist Curtis Roberson Jr. and drummer Tony St. James.

programme.title: The MotorMusic Jazz Sessions
programme.desc: The MotorMusic Studios in Mechelen, Belgium, attract many great musicians to the city. A wide variety of visiting international jazz musicians share their art of making jazz music with the DJAZZ series Belgium Sessions. In these sessions, some of Europes finest musicians perform their own, original music. This episode presents Linus, a duo of two composers and improvisers: baritone guitar player Ruben Machtelinckx and tenor saxophonist Thomas Jillings. The intense sound produced by the tenor saxophone and the acoustic baritone guitar yields melodies that take you on a journey through a world of simplicity, purity, and longing.

programme.title: Jazz à Vienne
programme.desc: Jazz à Vienne is one of the worlds most prestigious jazz festivals. Ever since 1981, it has attracted a mix of jazz legends and exciting newcomers, with many of them playing return engagements. Each year welcomes outstanding international stars to the historical Le Theâtre Antique to impress and inspire their audiences. In 2019, French guitarist Paul Jarret performed with renowned New York drummer Jim Black at Jazz à Vienne. Together they present Ghost Songs, a hybrid of rock and jazz. They are joined by saxophonist Julien Pontvianne and pianist Jozef Dumoulin.

programme.title: Germeringer Jazztage
programme.sub-title: Germeringer Jazztage: Paco de Lucía and Group
programme.desc: This broadcast shows a rare appearance at the 1996 Germeringer Jazztage by the legendary flamenco guitarist Paco de Lucía and his sextet. Some may question the inclusion of a flamenco guitarist within a jazz festival. However, the similarities between flamenco and blues have been well documented: both are the outlet for a poor, disenfranchised minority, with a primitive strength, boundless capabilities for improvisation and a requirement for breathtaking virtuosity - all qualities shown by Paco de Lucía in this performance. Moreover, he has long been experimenting with jazz forms (evident even from his inclusion of bass, drums, and saxophone in his sextet), while still retaining the essence of the flamenco tradition. In his own words: "What I have tried to do is have a hand holding onto tradition and the other scratching, digging in other places trying to find new things I can bring into flamenco".

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Terrasson and Belmondo
programme.sub-title: Terrasson and Belmondo: À Nous Garo
programme.desc: Every year, the Jazz en Baie festival takes place in the beautiful bay of Mont Saint-Michel Todays broadcast shows a special gathering between two grandmasters of French jazz: pianist Jacky Terrasson and trumpeter Stephane Belmondo. The two team up for an amazing concert in which jazz is combined with soul and a touch of chanson française. The Franco-American pianist Terrasson delights in travelling the world, collaboration with others and leading his own trio, quartet, or quintet. With his long-time friend, Stephane Belmondo, Terrasson has produced wonderful CDs and beautiful concerts. One then finds the trumpeter on the pianists album Gouache; on another, the pianist guests on Belmondos Ever After. At the Jazz en Baie festival, the duo plays its amazing piano and trumpet music. Highly recommended!

programme.title: Lex Jasper Trio
programme.sub-title: Lex Jasper Trio: Happy Days Are Here Again
programme.desc: Lex Jasper Trio: Happy Days Are Here Again - the title says is all… After an automobile accident and 15 years of revalidation, he is back! Together with his musical pals Edwin Corzilius (double bass) and Frits Landesbergen (drums), pianist and composer Lex Jasper celebrates his return to jazz club The Duke in the Dutch village of Nistelrode. Following his car accident, Lex nearly joined the leagues of Netherlands "forgotten" jazz heroes, though he is still considered one of the most important artists and composers of his generation and Dutch jazz history. Jasper played and recorded with all the greats, including Toots Thielemans, Clark Terry, Joe Pass, and Rita Reys.

programme.title: Agnes Gosling Quartet - InJazz 2019
programme.desc: Jazz festival slash conference inJazz brings together the supply and demand sides of the Dutch jazz scene, helping artists share knowledge and experiences and stimulating the development of international relationships. The conference program includes inspiring panel discussions, workshops, networking sessions and presentations. During the night, promising Dutch jazz acts as well as more seasoned groups hit the stage to show what theyre capable of. One of the artists performing at inJazz is Agnes Gosling. She has matured as a writer and arranger. The vocalist is unafraid to show her vulnerability. With her quartet, Gosling honors the tradition of great acoustic jazz while exploring new sounds and styles from the contemporary music world.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Sao Paulo Samba
programme.desc: An exceptional concert from Brazil: the Orquestra Sinfônica do Estado de Sao Paulo proves its position as the most important orchestra in Latin America. Conducted by charismatic Maestro John Neschling since 1997, the orchestra is defined by its emblematic interpretations of Latin American music. With "Sao Paulo Samba", the orchestra yet again grips the listener with an electrifying selection of Brazilian and Latin American classics, including works by Heitor Villa-Lobos, Joao Bosco and Astor Piazzolla. The Banda Mantiqueira and singer Mônica Salmaso complement the show.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Paradox Live
programme.desc: Innovative contemporary jazz and improvised music, the search for modernity, mind blowing sounds, rock and pop… Indeed PARADOX Tilburg goes beyond jazz, crossing musical boundaries into the unknown soundscapes of electronic music. Indie artists, blues veterans and jazz superstars all pour their hearts and souls at the Paradox. From young, local talents to top national and international artists, PARADOX Tilburg is the most intimate jazz club in the Netherlands, with a devoted audience from all across Europe. In their TV show PARADOX LIVE you get a taste of the greatest concerts and interviews with artists from all around the world. This episode of PARADOX LIVE presents the talented Dutch jazz singer Sanne Rambags accompanied by Jeroen van Vliet (piano) and Vincent Courtois (cello).

programme.title: The Morgenland Festival
programme.desc: Since 2005, the Morgenland Festival of Osnabrueck has dedicated itself to the fascinating music culture of the Near and Middle East. From traditional and classical music to avant-garde, jazz, and rock, the festival program also features art, such as visual arts, dance, and theatre of interdisciplinary projects. The Morgenland Chamber Orchestra has been an integral part of the Morgenland Festival since 2009. This ensemble of musicians from Germany and various guest countries performs as part of the festivals opening concert. This episode includes performances sometimes energetic, sometimes soft and soothing.

programme.title: Christian McBride - Brother Malcolm
programme.desc: On July 20, 2018, double bassist Christian McBride presented his band "New Jawn" at the Malta Jazz Festival. A five-time Grammy winner, McBride is one of the most requested, most recorded, and most respected figures in the music world today. Hailing from Philadelphia, this music luminary combines jazz, RandB, pop/rock, hip hop/neo-soul, and classical. Gracing the Malta Jazz stage with him are Nasheet Waits (drums), Marcus Strickland (tenor sax), and Josh Evans (trumpet).

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Comblain-la-Tour Jazz Festival
programme.sub-title: Comblain-la-Tour Jazz Festival: Jimmy McGriff Trio
programme.desc: As one of the best Hammond B3 organ players, Jimmy McGriff (1936-2008) is often lost among great soul-jazz organists from his hometown of Philadelphia. Of the major soul-jazz pioneers, he was the bluesiest and often insisted that he was more of a blues musician than a jazz artist. Regardless, he remained eclectic enough to blur the lines of genres. His sound - deep, down-to-earth grooves drenched in blues and gospel feeling - made him popular with RandB audiences. This 1965 performance is part of the Comblain-la-Tour Jazz Festival.

programme.title: Gregory Porter - Jazz a Vienne
programme.desc: "Jazz a Vienne" is one of the worlds most prestigious jazz festivals. Ever since 1981 it has attracted leading jazz artists, with many of them playing return engagements. Unsurprisingly, the festivals 2012 edition did not fall short of expectations: the lineup was filled with the biggest names in music. Among them was vocalist Gregory Porter transcends the jazz bubble. His magnificent, burnished baritone can sink into a lyric with luxurious ease, the melody gently sculpted into new shapes at every turn, with the rhythm tugging subtly back and forth across the bar line.

programme.title: Shalosh
programme.desc: The Israeli-New York band Shalosh offers raw acoustic progressive jazz, which has attracted international attention since the release of their first album. Despite the classic jazz format of the trio (piano, bass, and drums) and the bands deep roots in jazz and improvised music, Shalosh follows its own path, inspired by various styles: rock, classical music, electro, African music, and Middle Eastern music. The members of Shalosh have a connection not only through music, but also through a lifelong friendship. The three musicians recently put their international solo career on hold to perform as Shalosh.

programme.title: Kurt Rosenwinkel meets Peter Beets Trio
programme.desc: The Dutch world-class jazz pianist Peter Beets has shared the stage with jazz greats like Chick Corea, Wynton Marsalis, "Toots" Thielemans, Elvin Jones, George Coleman, Johnny Griffin, Benny Golson and John Clayton. From birth, Beets was surrounded by music: he heard classical music from his mother, who is a music pedagogue, and he heard jazz from his father, who has a great fan of Oscar Peterson and Art Blakey. Although Beets parents originally did not associate the word "musician" with the word "career", music is definitely in the familys blood. At this concert at the Kurhaus in Scheveningen, the Netherlands, Peter Beets teams up with the world-famous guitarist Kurt Rosenwinkel. With a career spanning almost twenty-five years and including collaborating with dynamic peers like Brad Mehldau, Brian Blade, Mark Turner, Joshua Redman, Chris Potter, as well as esteemed jazz legends like Joe Henderson, Paul Motian and Gary Burton, Rosenwinkels indelible mark in music is the consummation of being steeped in the rich and deep traditions of jazz, springing off of the shoulders of such vital underpinnings to elevate his own art to new heights, evolving the language in a way no other guitarist has since his arrival. This collaboration between Beets and Rosenwinkel guarantees brilliant music.

programme.title: The Hammond© Sessions
programme.desc: The Dutch Hammond organ player Rob Mostert develops, in cooperation with DJAZZ, the programme Mostert Meets. In this series, the Hammond B3 organ takes centre stage. Rob Mostert invites the worlds finest jazz musicians for a musical collaboration, in which the Hammond Organ plays a major role. The Hammond B3 is an electric organ, which generates sound by creating an electric current from rotating a metal tonewheel near an electromagnetic pickup. Initially, the Hammond B3 was at home in churches, until it entered the jazz scene in the mid-20th century. In this episode, Mostert joins forces with the Australian Hammond organ player Lachy Doley and his regular band. Doley is considered one of the best blues, soul and rock organ players, nicknamed "the Jimi Hendrix of the Hammond organ".

programme.title: Jazz Greats
programme.desc: American trumpeter Miles Davis (1926-1991) was a pioneering jazz musician from the late 1940s to the late 1980s. His influence on 20th century music is hard to overstate as he trailblazed bebop, cool jazz, hardbop, modal jazz, and electronic music. On October 11, 1964, Miles Davis performed at Teatro DellArte in Milan. With tenor saxophonist Wayne Shorter, pianist Herbie Hancock, bassist Ron Carter and drummer Tony Williams, Davis performed Autumn Leaves, My Funny Valentine, All Blues, All of You, and Joshua

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: TorTube
programme.desc: Jazz fans in television land have come to the right place for their dose of first-rate world jazz: TorTube! Jazz club De Tor in Enschede is one of Europes most authentic jazz venues, with an absolutely unique ambiance. Some of the best musicians from Holland and the rest of the world find their way to De Tor to perform for an appreciative audience of jazz fans. This episode of TorTube entitled Vagen, features iconic Swedish jazz pianist Martin Tingvall and his trio. Tingvall has a knack for writing bright melodies that sound like they have been around for ages. During the Tingvall Trios performance at De Tor in Enschede, the bands irresistible grooves reveal drummer Jurgen Spiegels rock and hip hop background, and double bass player Omar Rodriguez Calvos Cuban heritage.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Hadar Noiberg and Chano Domínguez Duo - Moods
programme.desc: Since its opening in 1992, jazz club Moods has developed into one of Zurichs largest and most prominent cultural venues. At the same time, it has become one of Europes prominent jazz clubs which today enjoys a well-deserved worldwide reputation among musicians and critics. The venue books a large variety of genres, ranging from jazz and soul to electronic and international music. At Moods, Israeli flautist Hadar Noiberg and Spanish pianist Chano Domínguez merge jazz and international music. They borrow from their respective countries rhythms and traditions, resulting in music that ranges from melancholy to lively.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Omer Avital Qantar - Jazz in Duketown
programme.desc: Jazz in Duketown is the largest free outdoor jazz festival in the Netherlands. Its a real gathering for jazz addicts, inviting internationally renowned artists. Israeli-American double bassist Omer Avital plays radiantly energetic, resounding jazz with oriental influences. At Jazz in Duketown 2019, Avital forms a quintet with saxophonists Asaf Yuria and Alexander Levin, drummer Ofri Nehemya and pianist Eden Ladin. They present singular repertoire from Avitals album Qantar.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Salif Keita and Les Ambassadeurs
programme.desc: Salif Keitas music is a rich combination of traditional Malian music with European and American influences. We can hear this in the instrumentation of Keitas music, which varies from traditional West-African instruments to Western European ones. The Malian singer was cast out by his family because of his albinism. In 1967 he moved to Bamako, where he started his musical career and joined Les Ambassadeurs (Internationaux). He achieved international acknowledgement with this band in the 1970s. After spending a couple of years in Ivory Coast, Salif has found his home base in Paris since 1984. During this 2010 concert, he proves to be rightfully referred to as "The Golden Voice of Africa".

programme.title: Kurhaus Scheveningen
programme.desc: The Dutch world-class jazz pianist Peter Beets has shared the stage with jazz greats like Chick Corea, Wynton Marsalis, "Toots" Thielemans, Elvin Jones, George Coleman, Johnny Griffin, Benny Golson and John Clayton. From birth, Beets was surrounded by music: he heard classical music from his mother, who is a music pedagogue, and he heard jazz from his father, who has a great fan of Oscar Peterson and Art Blakey. Although Beets parents originally did not associate the word "musician" with the word "career", music is definitely in the familys blood. At this concert at the Kurhaus in Scheveningen, the Netherlands, Peter Beets teams up with the world-famous guitarist Kurt Rosenwinkel. With a career spanning almost twenty-five years and including collaborating with dynamic peers like Brad Mehldau, Brian Blade, Mark Turner, Joshua Redman, Chris Potter, as well as esteemed jazz legends like Joe Henderson, Paul Motian and Gary Burton, Rosenwinkels indelible mark in music is the consummation of being steeped in the rich and deep traditions of jazz, springing off of the shoulders of such vital underpinnings to elevate his own art to new heights, evolving the language in a way no other guitarist has since his arrival. This collaboration between Beets and Rosenwinkel guarantees brilliant music.

programme.title: Dave Brubeck and Paul Desmond live in Belgium
programme.desc: Dave Brubeck: Live in 64 boasts a beautifully filmed concert from one of the most beloved quartets in jazz history. Captured at the pinnacle of their power and popularity, Paul Desmond (alto sax), Joe Morello (drums), Eugene Wright (bass) and Dave Brubeck (piano) explore the trails they blazed into the realm of odd time signatures with "Forty Days" and two versions of their groundbreaking hit Take Five, as well as forays into world music with a unique interpretation of Koto Song. Their intimate onstage chemistry and impeccable musicianship made the DBQ an award-winning jazz supergroup.

programme.title: Brussels Jazz Orchestra
programme.desc: This might come unexpected, but the Brussels Jazz Orchestra (BJO) is not the kind of jazz orchestra that sticks to standards. They prefer to achieve the highest level by composing original music, creating unique arrangements, and playing inventively as well as passionately. In fact, it really is jazz with a dynamic orchestral sound, with a classic strength in which each musician is also a brilliant soloist. Call it an "orchestrated passion for jazz" that incites BJO to create world-class music. Founded in 1993 by Frank Vaganee, Serge Plume and Marc Godfroid, the Brussels Jazz Orchestra is recognised and has been subsidised by the Flemish Government since. Brussels Jazz Orchestra is orchestra in residence at Flagey in Brussels. During this project the BJO performs with David Linx. The Belgian jazz singer will resort to any idiom, any language, any time signature. Occasionally he seems to dispense with bar lines altogether, or he will go beyond lyrics, as he abandons his own words for some free-wheeling scat.

programme.title: Live at the Metro Theatre
programme.desc: The Australian-born singer-songwriter Sia Kate Isobelle Furler, simply known as Sia, is one of the most unique artists in todays popular music scene. However, her path to stardom has been nothing but rocky. Only after numerous musical experimentations, where the singer tried to establish herself in her home country as well as United Kingdom, Sia finally blossomed in United States around the second decade of the 21st century. The very beginnings of her mainstream recognition was captured on 25 March 2009, where the artist performed live at Metro Theatre in Sydney, Australia.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: The last chieftain
programme.desc: In 2019, the vibrant city of Sofia, Bulgaria, hosted the International A to JazZ Festival. Among the featured acts was the trailblazing jazz trumpeter Christian Scott aTunde Adjuah. This genre-defying artist captivated the audience with his eclectic "stretch music"; an approach that incorporates hip-hop and reaches back through the American canon into African percussion and its rich melodic content. Trumpeter Christian Scott aTunde Adjuahs quintet, which includes drummer Corey Fonville, percussionist Weedie Braimah, pianist Lawrence Fields, and bass guitarist Max Mucha, delivered a performance that defied boundaries and expectations.

programme.title: Count Basie and his Orchestra live in Charleroi
programme.desc: Count Basie is one of the most important bandleaders of the swing era. With the exception of a brief period in the early 50s, he led a big band from 1935 until his death almost 50 years later. Basies orchestra was characterized by a light, swinging rhythm section that he led from the piano, lively ensemble work, and generous soloing. Basie was not a composer like Duke Ellington or an important soloist like Benny Goodman. His instrument was his band, which was considered the epitome of swing and deeply influenced jazz. In this 1961 concert recording, Count Basie takes the stage in Charleroi.

programme.title: Sarah Vaughan Live in 58 and 64
programme.sub-title: Sarah Vaughan Live in 58 and 64: The Divine One
programme.desc: Sarah Vaughan: Live in 58 and 64 features the "Divine One" in her prime, wrapping her sultry voice around jazz standards such as Lover Man, "Misty" and "I Got Rhythm" and soaring on popular showtunes such as "Over The Rainbow" and Maria. One of the greatest voices of the 20th Century, her renditions of songs by Harold Arlen, Leonard Bernstein, Johnny Burke, the Gershwins and Stephen Sondheim are pure diva magic. These three performances demonstrate why Sarah Vaughan is invariably mentioned in the same breath as Ella Fitzgerald and Billie Holiday.

programme.title: Portrait of Maria Ana Bobone
programme.desc: Maria Ana Bobone (Portugal) is one of the best fado singers of her generation. She started singing fado when she was 16. Her debut album is called "Alma Nova" and marked the beginning of her amazing career. For the recordings of her next two albums, "Luz Destino" and "Senhora da Lapa" Maria Ana welcomed instruments that are usually not present in fado music: the harpsichord and saxophone. After that, she continued her career with the release of Nome de Mar, which received many positive reviews. At the moment, Maria Ana is performing at all Portugals major venues, as well as many festivals and concert halls throughout the world, with the aim to present fado music and Portuguese culture to other cultures. Bobones latest album, Fado and Piano, shows her diversity as an artist, composer and arranger. By including the piano she re-innovates the tradition of the early 20th century. This portrait shows Maria Anas performances and interviews in which she explains her passion for fado music and culture.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Jimmy Witherspoon Quartet and Rozaa Wortham 1985
programme.desc: Estival has been an annual jazz festival since 1977 and takes place in the Italian speaking part of Switzerland named Lugano. Estival offers an exhilarating and especially a surprising line-up that focuses in a particular world of modern music with rich sounds. At Estival, promoting the splendor, tolerance and existence between different cultures is supreme. Hereby Jimmy Witherspoon and Rozaa Wortham, two exceptionally special jazz musicians. Rozaa Wortham kicks off with the Jimmy Witherspoon Quartet. Swinging and energetic she sings It Dont Mean A Thing. Jimmy Witherspoon, known for the song Aint Nobodys Business, starts his performance with pleasant layed-back blues.

programme.title: The Morgenland Festival
programme.sub-title: The Morgenland Festival: I Will Not Be Sad
programme.desc: Since 2005, the Morgenland Festival, held in Osnabrueck, has dedicated itself to the fascinating music culture of the Near and Middle East. From traditional and classical music to avant-garde, jazz, and rock, the festival program also features art, such as visual arts, dance, and theatre of interdisciplinary projects. Jivan Gasparyan Jr has always been inspired by the folk melodies of his native Armenia. His grandfather, also a musician, taught him the art of duduk, an instrument of Armenian origin.

programme.title: A$AP Rocky and A$AP Ferg
programme.sub-title: A$AP Rocky and A$AP Ferg: Live at The Hordern Pavilion
programme.desc: Big hits, booty dancing, stage dives, fan freestyles and of course, controversy, A$AP Rockys debut Down Under tour had it all! At his sold-out Sydney show, hip hops hottest star and 5000 rowdy fans got wild for the night at the Hordern Pavilion and we captured it all exclusively.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Kenny Barron, DPW
programme.desc: Pianist Kenny Barrons June 27, 2019 appearance at the Alfa Jazz Festival in Ukraines Lviv was a celebration of sublime jazz virtuosity. The revered elder statesmen of jazz piano brought his regular working trio of Kiyoshi Kitagawa (bass) and Jonathan Blake (drums), augmented by stellar jazzman Marcus Strickland (tenor saxophone) and young lion Riley Mulherkar (trumpet). Their seamless blend of classic bebop and modern explorations spoke of a deep, emotive connection to each note, captivating the Ukrainian audience with lyrical improvisations during this unforgettable concert.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Estival Jazz Lugano
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. This performance of Brazilian Tania Maria promises to make you want to dance. The singer, composer and pianist sets fire to the Estival scene with her pop and jazzy song, magnificently put forward on samba, bossa-nova, Afro-Latin and jazz fusion tunes.

programme.title: Jong Metropole live at Radio Kootwijk
programme.desc: Jong Metropole (Young Metropole) is a unique collaboration between the Dutch Metropole Orchestra, the National Youth Orchestra of the Netherlands and the National Jazz Youth Orchestra of the Netherlands. It aims to prepare talented, young musicians in classical and light music for a professional career. Jong Metropole blends the best of different music genres, borrowing from the performance strength of classical strings to the swing, improvisation, and timing of jazz, and more. Conducted by Christian Elsasser, this special performance was recorded at the former radio transmission station, Kootwijk.

programme.title: Mike Stern and Didier Lockwood
programme.sub-title: Mike Stern and Didier Lockwood: Jazz à Vienne
programme.desc: Guitarist Mike Stern and violin player Didier Lockwood sharing a stage: that promises a good show! After playing for years with Blood, Sweat and Tears, Mike Stern landed a gig with drummer Billy Cobham and then broke through with Miles Davis comeback band in the 1980s. Didier Lockwood played in jazz fusion band Magma during the 1970s and is known for his use of electric amplification and experimentation. Together they perform a unique duo concert at the beautiful antique theatre in Vienne, France.

programme.title: Belgium Sessions
programme.desc: In this DJAZZ Belgium Sessions performance, which was recorded at AED Studios in Lint, Belgium, we witness Europes finest jazz musicians at work. A wide variety of international jazz musicians give a creative, up-close and inside insight into their art of playing jazz music. Young talent and established jazz musicians play to their hearts content: take for instance this unusual performance by the Swing Dealers, an ensemble that finds its roots in the swing jazz of the mid-20th century, but at the same time, it is strongly influenced by a more soulful and contemporary sound. The band evolves around saxophonist Vincent Mardens and vocalist/bassist Jean van Lint. The interaction between saxophone and vocals creates a unique and characteristic sound.

programme.title: Soul Makossa
programme.sub-title: Soul Makossa: Manu Dibango in Stuttgart
programme.desc: Manu Dibango, one of Africas biggest musical stars and top saxophonists, is an indispensable artist. He was one of the first African musicians to score a worldwide hit with his 1972 release "Soul Makossa", paving the way for many other artists. The very concept of world music owes much to him. A superb stage performer with great communicative humour, Dibango is above all one of the founding fathers of a modern African musical style that is open to jazz, RandB, salsa, gospel, funk, and reggae. This concert showcases all these genres, and features an excellent line-up of musicians from the four corners of the planet.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Bad Ass And Blind
programme.desc: Raul Midon appeared at 2017s Sing Jazz Festival in Singapore with double bassist Romeir Mendez and drummer Billy Williams. Blind since birth, Raul Midon is a singer, guitarist, and songwriter from New Mexico. With a vocal range as dynamic as his guitar playing and a remarkable talent for trumpet mimicry, Midons performances transcend musical boundaries, effortlessly blending rock, jazz, folk, and Latin pop into his unique sound. He has worked with numerous legends, including Bill Withers, Herbie Hancock, Sting, and Dianne Reeves, and his album "Bad Ass and Blind" was nominated for a Grammy Award for Best Jazz Vocal Album in 2018. No wonder the Sing Jazz audience were ecstatic!

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: The Morgenland Festival
programme.desc: Since 2005, the Morgenland Festival of Osnabrueck has dedicated itself to the fascinating music culture of the Near and Middle East. From traditional and classical music to avant-garde, jazz, and rock, the festival program also features art, such as visual arts, dance, and theatre of interdisciplinary projects. "The Art of Duo" presents an unprecedented duo featuring pianist Salman Gambarov and sheng player, a Chinese mouth-organ, Wu Wei.

programme.title: I want to talk about you
programme.desc: Explore the music of one of the most influential and innovative saxophonists in jazz history: John Coltrane! Immerse yourself in this collection of remarkable performances from the early 1960s that showcase Coltranes unparalleled artistry and unique sound during a transformative period in the artists career. Recorded in various European cities, Coltrane is seen playing the songs "Autumn Leaves", "Hackensack", "My Favorite Things", "I Want To Talk About You", "Vigil", and "Naima". Tune in and experience why the music of John Coltrane has touched the lives of so many!

programme.title: Gunsmoke Blues
programme.desc: In 1971, the camera crew of the Western series Gunsmoke travelled from Hollywood to the Pacific Northwest to capture blues greats Muddy Waters, Big Joe Turner, Big Mama Thornton and George "Harmonica" Smith during their tour. This documentary shows some of their best performances at the University of Oregon followed by footage and interviews on the road.

programme.title: Da Pá Virada Sessions
programme.desc: The Da Pá Virada Sessions series presents the best musicians of contemporary Brazilian jazz, and beyond. Filmed in Sao Paulo, each session offers a unique experience by giving a fresh look into Brazils music scene. The artists for each session are selected in consultation with Stingray DJAZZs music editor. One of the bands taking part in this series is Os Capoeira. This ensemble practices the traditional Brazilian martial art from Bahia it is named after, combining elements of dance, acrobatics, and percussive music. Moreover, Os Capoeira runs a cultural center in Sao Paulo. Let yourself be inspired by Os Capoeiras unique take on Brazilian culture!

programme.title: Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Charles Mingus And Eric Dolphy live in Liège
programme.desc: Charles Mingus showcases an exceptional concert performed in April 1965 featuring his most celebrated lineup: Jaki Byard (piano), Dannie Richmond (drums), Johnny Coles (trumpet), Clifford Jordan (tenor sax) and the great Eric Dolphy (alto sax, flute and bass clarinet). Recorded within an eight-day span, less than three months before Dolphys death, the three concerts showcase Minguss visionary leadership and the bands incredible depth and diversity with unique performances and arrangements of classics including "So Long Eric" and the groundbreaking Meditations On Integration.

programme.title: Mr. Phone Bone
programme.desc: The audience at the Montreal Jazz Festival in Canada was in for a treat on July 3, 1982, as a true musical innovator hit the stage: Jaco Pastorius, who transformed the electric bass into a formidable solo instrument. Combining intricate harmonics, fluid melodies, and unparalleled technical skill, Pastorius left a lasting impact on the music world. In this concert, he is accompanied by Peter Erskine (drums), Don Alias (percussion), Othello Molineaux (steel drums), Bob Mintzer (tenor sax and bass clarinet), and Randy Brecker (trumpet and electronics). They perform "Chicken", "Donna Lee", "Mr. Phone Bone", and "Fannie Mae". Dont miss this extraordinary opportunity to experience Jaco Pastoriuss electrifying performance at the Montreal Jazz Festival 1982!

programme.title: WOMEX 2018
programme.desc: Since 1994, World Music Expo (WOMEX) has been attracting musicians, agents, a great number of press agencies, as well as media companies from all over the world. Its main exposition event has been held in various locations throughout Europe, including Berlin, Brussels, Marseille, Stockholm, Seville, Cardiff, and Budapest. In 2018, WOMEX was held in Las Palmas, Gran Canaria. One of its showcase participants, Ladama, is a quintet of women multi-instrumentalists from Venezuela, Brazil, Colombia and the United States who not only perform as a touring band, but also strive to engage youth in their respective communities in the process of musicmaking, composition and audio production through collaboration and performance workshops. Ladama is a positive force in times urgently in need of tolerance and communication.

programme.title: Aleph at Olympia Paris
programme.desc: Aleph is the stage name of Lebanese pianist Fady Abi Saad. To celebrate the release of his debut album, Aleph took to Paris Olympia to perform an evenings worth of music before an appreciative crowd. Aleph brought with him a host of guest musicians, adding all kinds of musical colours to the evenings proceedings, including flamenco guitar, the spooky musical saw, and the Middle-Eastern qanun. The music may be classified as "world music," but "otherworldly music" is just as fitting.

programme.title: Erroll Garner
programme.desc: Erroll Garner: Live in 63 and 64 presents two beautifully filmed concerts featuring his classic trio of bassist Eddie Calhoun and drummer Kelly Martin. Erroll Garner was one of jazzs true original players and this showcases his improvisational brilliance on a parade of his most classic numbers, such as "Fly Me To The Moon" and "I Get A Kick Out Of You", as well as originals "Errolls Theme," "Mambo Erroll", and his best-known composition, "Misty".

programme.title: Belgium Sessions
programme.desc: In this DJAZZ Belgium Sessions performance, which was recorded at AED Studios in Lint, Belgium, we witness Europes finest jazz musicians at work. A wide variety of international jazz musicians give a creative, up-close and inside insight into their art of playing jazz music. Young talent and established jazz musicians play to their hearts content: take for instance this unusual performance by the trio Massot/Florizoone/Horbaczewski. This adventurous threesome pushes the boundaries of jazz, folk and classical music. There is a certain commonality between the instruments they play: accordion, tuba and cello share a richness of sound, as well as a broad register and a photogenic appearance. When improvising, the trio produces the weirdest and wackiest, but also most moving sounds.

programme.title: Michel Legrand Orchestra at Spa, 1982
programme.desc: Known outside jazz circles mainly for his film scores, French composer, arranger and pianist Michel Legrand has had a long and storied career in music. Interpreters of his compositions include jazz legends such as Sarah Vaughan, Stan Getz, and Bill Evans, as well as pop stars such as Barbra Streisand and Frank Sinatra. During this 1982 performance in the Belgian town of Spa, Legrand leads his orchestra through a number of original songs, including "The Summer Knows," "What Are You Doing the Rest of Your Life?" and "Les Moulins de mon Cœur." Singing either in English or French, Legrand delivers a spirited performance with plenty of romantic flair that is sure to capture your heart.

programme.title: O. Peterson Trio and S. Grappelli - Grand Gala du Disque in RAI Amsterdam
programme.desc: In the 1960s and 1970s, the annual Grand Gala du Disque was the awards ceremony during which the Edison Awards were presented to Dutch and international artists. These prestigious events were landmarks in the history of Dutch music broadcasting. On February 15, 1974, the astounding Canadian pianist Oscar Peterson and his trio of drummer Kenny Clarke and bassist Niels-Henning Ørsted Pedersen performed at the Grand Gala du Disque in RAI Amsterdam. They are soon after joined by eminent French-Italian violinist Stephane Grappelli.

programme.title: Seine Sessions
programme.desc: The term "jam-session" was born in the 1920s, when black and white musicians gathered in smoke-filled bars after their respective concerts to enjoy the kind of jazz they could not play in traditional sets. Bing Crosby was a regular at these sessions, and had fun marking the first and third beats of musical phrases by clapping hands, which the musicians call "jammin the beat". Today, the Seine Sessions revive the happy years of "jam sessions", while the cream of jazz, blues, gipsy and funk Parisian scenes occurs on the boards of the legendary restaurant and jazz club Le Reservoir. Entitled "Free and Afro Jazz," this episode hosted by Eddy King features unique performances by artists playing together for the first time, and interviews with Fantazio, Eddy Lopez, Banoit Savard, and many others.

programme.title: The Morgenland Festival
programme.desc: Since 2005, the Morgenland Festival of Osnabrueck has dedicated itself to the fascinating music culture of the Near and Middle East. From traditional and classical music to avant-garde, jazz, and rock, the festival program also features art, such as visual arts, dance, and theatre of interdisciplinary projects. Bursting with sounds that could only be described as magical, "MCO" features the Syrian Expat Philharmonic Orchestra under conductor Naci Özguç. Of Turkish origin, Özguç was raised by two opera singers, who opened the doors of a musical career.

programme.title: Tapmine
programme.desc: Sarah teeb sunge avastuse oma mineviku kohta; Holder saab arevust tekitava juhtumi; Seward naitab oma tõelist palet.

programme.desc: Kui Steve McGarrett naaseb koju Oahusse, et leida oma isa tapja, pakub kuberner talle võimalust juhtida oma tooruhma: 5-0.

programme.title: Kurjuse kannul
programme.desc: BAU otsib Clevelandis tegutsevat omakohut jagavat mõrvarit, Rossi on aga mures oma kunagise merejalavaeseersandi kadumise parast ja suundub Los Angelesse teda otsima. JJle ahvardab astuda kannule saladus, mida ta ruhma eest varjanud on.

programme.desc: Lightman ja Torres uurivad ravimifirmat, mis on seotud uhe Lightmani ulikooliaegse sõbraga. Foster ja Loker aitavad pidada Jeemeniga labiraakimisi kahe noore ameeriklase vabastamiseks.

programme.title: Chicago politseijaoskond

programme.desc: Surnukeha leidmine viib salarelvaarsenali avastamisenii. Roman toob noore haige poisi 21. jaoskonda toredat paeva veetma.

programme.title: NCIS

programme.desc: Merejalavae baasis sureb reality-show filmimise kaigus supermodell. Uurimise kaigus selgub, et modellil oli armukolmnurk lausa kolme mehega, mis kasvatab oluliselt kahtlusaluste hulka. Jenny on arritunud, et Gibbs keeldub minemast tema auks peetavale auhinnatseremooniale.

programme.title: Kurjuse kannul
programme.desc: BAU asub uurima mitut Pittsburghi kandis toime pandud mõrva ja otsib kahest tundmatust koosnevat tiimi. Garcia ja Morgan teevad mõlemad oma kallimatega sõbrapaevaplaane.

programme.title: Tapmine
programme.desc: Tiim slõpetab too; Sarah ja Holder uhendavad jõud, et leida "haal"; Sewardile pakutakse motivatsiooni kaskudele alluda.

programme.title: Chicago politseijaoskond
programme.desc: Meeskond avastab valitsusametniku moonutatud surnukeha ja saab teada, et tal oli ligipaas vaga olulistele seadmetele.

programme.desc: Kui Newfoundlandi tundrast leitakse mumifitseerunud surnukeha, asuvad Charlie ja Rex otsima ellujaajate kogukonda, kes võib varjata mõrvarit.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: Lendsalk suundub Viini, et uurida relvastatud runnakut ameeriklastele kuuluval jõekruiisilaeval.

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus
programme.desc: Maailma julgeim kohtingusaade on tagasi uute osalistega. Siin saates leiavad julged vallalised endale kaaslase pelgalt alasti ahvatluse põhjal. Esimesena valib saates 20-aastane neitsi Josh endale paarilise, kes temalt suutuse võtaks. Samuti on saates paarike Matt ja Mary, kes otsivad oma suhtesse kolmandat kaaslast.

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus
programme.desc: Selles saates otsib endale kaaslast 27-aastane Chris Londonist, kellel on villand pidutsemisest ja ta tahab paarisuhet. Teisena valib samuti 27-aastane tehnofoob Louise, kes ei ole lainud kaasa moodsa kohtingumaailma võimalustega ja otsib vanaaegset meest, kes ta jalust rabaks.

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: Pinget "Armastuse saare" villas jatkub. Tana uletavad meie imeilusad vallalised veel palju konarusi ja kogevad elu meeldejaavaimat suve paradiisis. Ja kuna laual on suur rahaline preemia, siis keegi ei taha unistusest loobuda. Aga jargmine valjalangemine ei lase end oodata…

programme.title: Agatha Christie krimilood. Miks nad ei kutsunud Evansit?
programme.desc: Frankie ja Bobby kahtlustavad aina enam doktor Nicholsoni, kelle ahvardav olek viib neid lahendusele sammukese lahemale. Kõik pole aga nii, nagu esmapilgul naib. Riskides teineteise ja põrguliku mõistatuse parast eluga, tabavad Frankie ja Bobby lõpuks mõrvari ja saavad selgust ka mustilises kusimuses "Miks nad ei kutsunud Evansit?"

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: Endine puusepp ja ta kihlatu saavad tanu lotovõidule teha teoks oma kauaaegse unistuse kodust Mainei rannikul. Davei abil asuvad nad otsima oma taiuslikku maja.

programme.title: Pilvede all
programme.desc: Õed kohtuvad Pireti juures, et uksteisele toeks olla. Samal ajal viskleb Erik kahe naise vahel ning Sirjel on Albertile ja Innale uudiseid. Maimu pabistab Kertu raamatu parast ning Mari otsustab selgeks teha, kes on see salaparane naine Indreku elus.

programme.title: Vana silla saladus
programme.desc: Mauricio uritab Fed aidata. Julieta vajab uut kaitsestrateegiat. Isaac valmistub abielluma.

programme.title: Esmakohtingud teismelistele
programme.desc: End rokijumalaks pidav Aaron kohtub Maisiega. Sasha, kes pole kunagi suudelnud, on kohtingul Lucasega.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Abigail piitsutab Edenit. Justinile koidab uus lootus.

programme.title: Poissmees
programme.desc: Zach ja allesjaanud naised naasvad Londonisse, kus neid ootab veel uks seiklusrikas nadal; Zach on sattunud enneolematusse stsenaariumi, mis võib asjade edasist kaiku oluliselt mõjutada.

programme.title: Toidu ABC
programme.desc: Maitsvad road ja joogid on jõulupuhade kohustuslik osa, kuid pidulaua katmine võib tunduda hirmuaratava ettevõtmisega. "Toidu ABC" jõulu-erisaade teeb sulle selgeks kõik, mida on vaja, et saaksid oma pere ja sõbrad tanavu paremini, soodsamalt ja kiiremalt ara toita. Kuid esmalt saavad Jimmy, Kate, Matt ja Helen endale abiks kolm uut tiimiliiget, kellega koos jõuludilemmasid lahendama asuda.

programme.title: Lena Lorenz
programme.desc: Lena nõustab paari, kes on võtnud kinnisideeks laps just tema hoole alla ilmale tuua. Ootamatult satub rase naine haiglasse, kus selgub, et ta elab Saksamaal ebaseaduslikult. Lenale valmistab palju suuremat muret tema enda seisund, sest ta saab teada, et on ka ise lapseootel. Julia eraelu naib ulesmage minevat, kuid kas tema silmarõõm Oscar tunneb tõmmet ikka tema vastu?

programme.title: Lena Lorenz
programme.desc: Lena nõustab paari, kes on võtnud kinnisideeks laps just tema hoole alla ilmale tuua. Ootamatult satub rase naine haiglasse, kus selgub, et ta elab Saksamaal ebaseaduslikult. Lenale valmistab palju suuremat muret tema enda seisund, sest ta saab teada, et on ka ise lapseootel. Julia eraelu naib ulesmage minevat, kuid kas tema silmarõõm Oscar tunneb tõmmet ikka tema vastu?

programme.title: Kuninglik armastuse retsept
programme.desc: Emma tootab New Yorgis pagarina. Kui ta palgatakse Sanovia kuningliku paari pulma-aastapaeva peole kupsetisi valmistama, on ta veendunud, et see võib sillutada talle tee oma kokaraamatu valjaandmiseni.

programme.title: Saladused
programme.desc: 14-aastane Gertrud ihaldab taiskasvanute vabadusi ja tutvub rate.ee-s 37-aastase mehega, kes meeleldi tutvustab talle "suurte inimeste" rõõme. Paraku peituvad selles Gertrudile nii põnevana tundunud maailmas omad kohutavad ohud...

programme.title: Õhtu!
programme.desc: Aasta meelelahutajad Juri Butshakov, Piret Laos ja Robert Rool ei puhka loorberitel. Igal argiõhtul kompavad nad nii uksteise kui ka televaatajate huumorisoone ning taluvuse piire. Lõbusad eksperimendid, ullatuslikud intervjuud, intrigeerivad valjakutsed panevad kaasa elama ja muudavad toopaeva õhtud meeleolukaks.

programme.title: Esmakohtingud teismelistele
programme.desc: Poole kohaga vetelpaastja Jamie-Lee otsib vanakooli romantikat. Tara kohtub jalkahullu Alexiga.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Abigail pihib Timile. Eden vajutab Abigaili nuppudele. Bree reedab Levi.

programme.title: Armastusega Hawaiil
programme.desc: Suurlinnas arhitektina tootav Gemma peab minema Hawaiile oma lahkunud tadi valduseid korrastama. Tadi viimase soovi jargi talitades alustab Gemma peahoone renoveerimisest. Talle tuleb ehitustoodele appi nagus Ben, kes suudab lisaks majale ka Gemmasse uue elu sisse puhuda.

programme.title: Proua Ameerika
programme.desc: Gloria, Bella ja Jill avaldavad Valgele Majale survet, et president tegutseks vastavalt riikliku naistekonverentsi ettepanekutele. Phyllis valmistub 1980. aasta presidendivalimiste lahenedes oma poliitilisi võite ara kasutama.

programme.title: Poissmees
programme.desc: Zach teeb kaotatud aega tasa Eestis Tallinnas, kus paneb proovile oma klapi uhe naisega sõbraliku kohaliku võistluse kaigus ja valjub oma mugavustsoonist, heites ult kõik riided ja astudes sauna. Lisaks laseb panna oskused mangu Eesti nõial - ehk aitab see armastust leida?

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus
programme.desc: Siin saates leiavad julged vallalised endale kaaslase pelgalt alasti ahvatluse põhjal. Esimesena valib saates kaaslast 30-aastane Leah, kellele meeldivad nii mehed kui naised ning kellel aitab kaaslast valida eksimatu ninaga koer Kush. Jargmine õnnelik valija on 24-aastane võistluskunstide õpetaja Ryan, kes kannatab elumuutva haiguse kaes.

programme.title: Valelikud võrgutajad
programme.desc: Aria, Emily ja Hanna otsivad Spencerit taga, aga ta ei soovi, et teda leitaks. Emily kohtub olumpiamangudel kuldmedali võitnud Missy Frankliniga.

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: Seiklus "Armastuse saarel" jatkub ja meie imeilusatele noortele on varuks veel palju ullatusi. Saareelanikud veedavad suve flirtides, kohtingutel kaies ja lõbutsedes, kuid kõik teavad, et võistlus suure auhinna nimel on kaimas ja vaga tuline. Kuna kaalul on nii palju, pole keegi neist valmis lahkuma.

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: Üksikema, kes on pikalt unistanud oma vaikesest raabakast elamisest suuremasse kolimisest saab parast nelja miljoni dollari suurust lotovõitu oma unistuse viimaks ellu viia.

programme.title: Pilvede all
programme.desc: Erikul on Kertule ootamatu ettepanek. Mari tunnistab Sirjele oma suurt eksimust ja Piret kohtub ootamatult Urmasega. Gunnaril on Albertile ja Innale murettekitavaid uudiseid ning Maimu mõõt saab lõplikult tais.

programme.title: Vana silla saladus
programme.desc: Matías muretseb oma vanemate parast. Carmelo teeb Severole etteheiteid. Prudencio pakub Julietale abi.

programme.title: Esmakohtingud teismelistele
programme.desc: Poole kohaga vetelpaastja Jamie-Lee otsib vanakooli romantikat. Tara kohtub jalkahullu Alexiga.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Abigail pihib Timile. Eden vajutab Abigaili nuppudele. Bree reedab Levi.

programme.title: Poissmees
programme.desc: Zach teeb kaotatud aega tasa Eestis Tallinnas, kus paneb proovile oma klapi uhe naisega sõbraliku kohaliku võistluse kaigus ja valjub oma mugavustsoonist, heites ult kõik riided ja astudes sauna. Lisaks laseb panna oskused mangu Eesti nõial - ehk aitab see armastust leida?

programme.title: Toidu ABC
programme.desc: "Toidu ABC" astub uude aastakumnesse hulga tervislike nippidega, et jaanuarile korralik start anda. Jimmy uurib Tais, kas ingver on tõesti selline imevili, nagu raagitakse ning testib, kuidas mõjub õlle joomine enne veini. Amandale selgub ullatavaid tõdesid Popeye spinatiarmastuse kohta, Matt uurib lihtsamaid mooduseid paevase puu- ja juurviljakoguse tarbimiseks ja Andi kulastab hambaarsti.

programme.title: Lena Lorenz
programme.desc: Emma lastakse koos kolmikutega viimaks haiglast valja ning nuud peavad nad Karliga kahekesi hakkama saama. See pole aga uldse lihtne, seda enam, et abilist on võimatu leida, kuigi Lena helistab kõik kohad labi. Ootamatult seisab noorpaari ukse taga Karli ema, kuigi Karli vaitel on ta vanemad surnud. Karl aga viskab ta valja ning keeldub Emmale midagi selgitamast. Kui Emma Lorenzi tallu kolib, arvab Lena, et naistel on aeg ohjad haarata.

programme.title: Lena Lorenz
programme.desc: Lena leiab, et on vimane aeg vastata Quirini kusimusele ning oelda jaa-sõna. Julia tahab korraldada neile ullatuspeo ja paneb kõik sõbrad rakkesse.

programme.title: Armastusega Hawaiil
programme.desc: Suurlinnas arhitektina tootav Gemma peab minema Hawaiile oma lahkunud tadi valduseid korrastama. Tadi viimase soovi jargi talitades alustab Gemma peahoone renoveerimisest. Talle tuleb ehitustoodele appi nagus Ben, kes suudab lisaks majale ka Gemmasse uue elu sisse puhuda.

programme.title: Saladused
programme.desc: 58-aastane Aime elab koos oma poja ja poja perega oma tadi, 85-aastase Leida kolmetoalises korteris. Pidevalt on perekonda painanud ruumikitsikus, kuid olukorda komplitseerib veelgi eaka tadi Leida suvenev dementsus. Vastuseisust hoolimata paigutab perekond tadi lõpuks hooldekodusse, kus ta varsti sureb. Pealtnaha lahenenud olukord võtab aga ootamatu poorded, kui Leida poltergeistina tegutsema hakkab ja kurja vaimu teod pereliikmetele eluohtlikuks muutuvad.

programme.title: Õhtu!
programme.desc: Aasta meelelahutajad Juri Butshakov, Piret Laos ja Robert Rool ei puhka loorberitel. Igal argiõhtul kompavad nad nii uksteise kui ka televaatajate huumorisoone ning taluvuse piire. Lõbusad eksperimendid, ullatuslikud intervjuud, intrigeerivad valjakutsed panevad kaasa elama ja muudavad toopaeva õhtud meeleolukaks.

programme.title: Esmakohtingud teismelistele
programme.desc: Seekord lahevad kohtama Disney superfann ja kuulsa isa habelik poeg.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Levi parib Breelt aru. Remi võtab seisukoha. Eden saab teada tõe.

programme.title: Ideaalne kaaslane
programme.desc: Noor ja kaunis Athena kolib Los Angelesi, et proovida katt kirjanikuna. Raha teenimiseks laheb vallaline neiu toole kohtingufirmasse, kus ta kaib kohtamas Amy nime all. Ta tunneb end selles toos nii vabalt, et kui ta puuab leida seda uhte ja õiget, ei oska ta enam Athenana kohtamas kaia.

programme.title: Lootusega lõunasse
programme.desc: Perekond Roberts lahkub sungest sõjajargsest Manchesterist, et alustada uut elu maailma kuklapoolel.

programme.title: Poissmees
programme.desc: Parast nadala jagu maalilisi vaateid, mustilisi selgeltnagijaid ja kuumaõhupallisõite on Zack oma uhe ja õige leidmisele jalle veidi lahemal.

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus
programme.desc: Tanases saates otsib endale kaaslast 27-aastane Richard, kes laulab bandis ja on naiste lemmik, kuid tema tahab hoopis meest. 50-aastane lahutatud David otsib seikluslikku naist, kellega oma elu jagada.

programme.title: Valelikud võrgutajad
programme.desc: "A" mangib riskantset mangu. Aria puuab saada selgust, mida ta Ezra vastu tunneb. Hanna satub Calebi peretuli keskele. Spencer puuab teada saada Mona haiglas viibimise uksikasju.

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: "Armastuse saare" viies nadal on taies hoos ja rahva lemmikvillas ei paista lõbul, flirdil ja draamal lõppu tulevat. Saareelanike jaoks on see unustamatu suvi, kuid paradiisis lõpuni pusida pole lihtne. Ja kuna võitjapaarile on laual 50 000-naelane auhind, teevad noored kõik, mis suudavad, et lõppu jõuda.

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: Naise ja viie lapsega kitsukeses kodus elava pereisa jaoks ei oleks saanud 750 000 dollari suurune lotovõit enam paremal ajal tulla. Nuud aitab Dave neil leida tapselt õige maja.

programme.title: Pilvede all
programme.desc: Pireti suhe Urmasega on hoogsalt edasi arenenud, samal ajal kui Mari ei tea, mis saab tema abielust Indrekuga. Kertu puhendub toole, kuid ka Erik ei anna võimalust end unustada. Haapsalus võtab Sirje vastu ullatava otsuse.

programme.title: Vana silla saladus
programme.desc: Emilia ja Alfonso valmistuvad kohtumiseks kindraliga. Fe rahustab Mauriciot. Saúl teeb olulise jarelduse.

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Louisianas leitakse ooklubist jõhkral moel tapetud mees koos tema verest labiligunenud sildiga, millel on kirjas "Sa nakatasid mu AIDSi." Politseil on kusimusi rohkem kui vastuseid. Kas tegu oli viharoimaga? Kas tapja kavatseb tegutsemist jatkata?

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Jaht Georgias Columbuses sukaga kagistava sarimõrvarile viib Carlton Gary vahistamise ja suudimõistmiseni, kuid aastaid hiljem tekib siiski kahtlusi ta suu osas.

programme.title: Reporter+
programme.desc: Uudistemagasinide lipulaev, mis toob olulisemad ja põnevamad uudised kodumaalt ja mujalt maailmast vaatajateni Reporterile omasel mahlakal moel. Saatejuhid on alati soliidsed Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Kaks kanget Ameerikas
programme.desc: Kaks kanget jõuavad Las Vegasesse, maailma meelelahutuspealinna. Või siiski patupealinna? Otsustage ise. Teet ja Kristjan lasevad end Las Vegase Stripi aarde koondunud toretsevate hotellide ja kasiinode saral kaasa meelitada. Paikese loojudes valja tanavale minnes saab usna pea selgeks, et kogu maailm on Stripile kokku tulnud ja seda vaid uhe eesmargiga - lõbutseda ja saada miljonariks!

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Elitaarsest ulikoolilinnast kaob kaks naist ning kui nad leitakse surnult, puhkeb kohalikus kogukonnas paanika. Milliseid hamaraid saladusi tuleb valja, kui kaks peret asuvad tegutsema, et aidata tapja tabada ja trellide taha toimetada?

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Texases, Austinis paljastatud lastehoiu pilastusskandaal šokeerib kogukonda ja naised ule kogu maa hakkavad raakima oma ritualistliku vaarkohtlemise lugusid. Kas kõige taga võib olla satanistide võrgustik?

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Hulkur Texasest on vaidetavalt pannud toime sadu jõhkraid mõrvu. Üks toimik teise jarel saab suletud ja ta mõistetakse surma. Kuid mõned uurijad kahtlevad, kas trellide taha sai ikka tegelik tapja. Kas on võimalik, et kulmavereline mõrvar on jatkuvalt vabaduses?

programme.title: 100 erilist eestlast
programme.desc: 100 erilist eestlast poorab sel hooajal tahelepanu ka noortele talentidele. Üks talentidest on noor ja andekas muusik Jaagup Tuisk. Milline on Jaagupi igapaevaelu, kuidas sai alguse tema põnev teekond jpm, selle kõik uurib valja saatejuht Leho Lehis.

programme.title: 100 erilist eestlast
programme.desc: Sel korral sõidab Leho Lehis kulla Saue hobyzonei, kus kohtub Rando ja tema pojaga, kes tegelevad uheskoos raadioteel juhitavate krossibagide võidusõiduga. Saate teises pooles sukeldume pea ees põnevasse ja palju meediakara tekitanud 5G maailma.

programme.title: Mõistatustekutid
programme.desc: Josh Gates saadab Jessica Choboti ja Phil Torrese looderannikule, et nad uuriks saja aasta tagust raportit, mille jargi olid viis meest St Helensi mael kohanud hiiglaslikke ahvmehi.

programme.title: Jalg
programme.desc: Erisaade Eesti võimsaimast maismaatuulepargist! Keskkonnasaate seekordne osa võtab televaataja kaasa poorasele teekonnale, kus jalgime hiigelsuurte tuulegeneraatorite detailide transporti Paldiski Lõunasadamast Saarde valda, kuhu on kerkimas Eesti seni võimsaim maismaatuulepark. Uurime, milleks meile maismaatuulepargid ja kui keeruline neid rajada on.

programme.title: Reporter+
programme.desc: Uudistemagasinide lipulaev, mis toob olulisemad ja põnevamad uudised kodumaalt ja mujalt maailmast vaatajateni Reporterile omasel mahlakal moel. Saatejuhid on alati soliidsed Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Rooli võim
programme.desc: Eesti staažikaim liiklussaade, mille teemade ring ulatub automarkidest kindlustuseni. Saade paneb proovile ka tuntud inimeste sõiduoskused ning nad paljastavad, mis neid siinses liikluses hairib ning mida tuleks liikluses umber korraldada. Muu hulgas osalevad saate tegijad ka liiklusreididel. Rooli Võim ei ole mõeldud uksnes tanastele autoomanikele ja juhtidele, vaid kõigile, kel tuleb rohkemal või vahemal maaral liiklusega kokku puutuda, ehk siis ka jalakaijatele ja uhistranspordiga liiklejatele.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Peggy kulutab 2000 dollarit kodukaunistamise kursustele ja asub nuud agaralt Bundyde maja kaunistama. Puutumata ei jaa ka Ali varjupaik - tema kallis tualett.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Kingapoodi variseb 2. korrusel asuv aeroobikastuudio ja Al vabastatakse ajutiselt toolt. Ta asub toole oma vana kooli turvamehena.

programme.title: Minu pere mõrvamusteerium
programme.desc: Vandeadvokaadid uurivad oma seni vanimat juhtumit, naisreisija uppumist 1839. aastal Staffordshireis reisijateveoks kasutatud kitsa paadi pardal, mille eest paadimehed suudi mõisteti ja avalikult ules poodi.

programme.title: Jaahoki MM
programme.desc: Jaahoki 2025. aasta maailmameister selgub 9. kuni 25. maini Taanis ja Rootsis toimuval turniiril. Teekonda ihaldatud tiitli poole alustavad 16 meeskonda, kes on jaotatud kahte alagruppi. A alagruppi kuuluvad Austria, Kanada, Soome, Prantsusmaa, Lati, Slovakkia, Sloveenia ja Rootsi, mangitakse Stockholmis. B alagruppi kuuluvad Tšehhi, Taani, Saksamaa, Ungari, Kasahstan, Norra, Šveits ja USA. Need mangud toimuvad Herningis. Alagrupiturniir mangitakse 9. kuni 20. maini. Mõlemast alagrupist 4 paremat paasevad rehamangudele kaheksa parema hulka. Veerandfinaalid mangitakse 22. mail. Poolfinaalid mangitakse 24. mail. 3.-4. koha mang ja finaal mangitakse 25. mail.

programme.title: Mr. Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean ostab oma esimese televiisori, kuid tal on probleeme signaaliga. Lõpuks leiab ta lahenduse, millele mitte ukski normaalse ajuga inimene ei tuleks ka tuhande aasta jooksul. Mr Beanil on ka teine uus manguasi, polaroid-kaamera. Kui see temalt pargis varastatakse, otsustab Bean varga omal jõul kinni puuda.

programme.desc: Christy on uksikema, kes parast alkoholismi ja narkosõltuvusega võitlemist otsutab teha oma elule restardi. Ta alustab tood ettekandjana, kaib korraparaselt AA kohtumistel kohal ning elu tundub õigel teel olevat, kuniks tema ellu ja majja trugib tagasi tema ema Bonnie.

programme.desc: Charlie on sunnitud valima oma kihlatu Chelsea ja vana kallima Mia vahel. Jakeil on raske harjuda uue vaikese õega.

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest
programme.desc: Kui Chelsea saab Charlie nõusse, et ta lubaks Alani uuel tudrukul Melissal sisse kolida, hakkab tudruk Charlie majas peremehetsema.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Al ja Kelly teesklevad haigeid, sest ei taha Peggy emale kulla sõita. Kelly jaab lõpuks aga pariselt haigeks ja Al peab ta eest hoolitsema.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Al otsustab, et autol pole kindlustust vaja ja Bud teeb sellega kohe avarii. Budi sõnul sõitis nende autole otsa Mercedes ja kutsub kohtusse ka Marcy tunnistama.

programme.title: Kontor
programme.desc: Michael saadetakse tooasjus Winnipegi. Andy ja Oscar sõidavad kaasa ja saavad ootamatult sõpradeks, kui nad purjus peaga Angelale helistavad. Jim loeb paevi, millal Pam kunstikoolist tagasi tuleb.

programme.title: Kontor
programme.desc: Toby tuleb Costa Ricast tagasi ja ajab Michaeli hulluks. Tema ja Dwight uritavad Tobyle sule sappa anda talle "uimasteid" sahtlisse sokutades. Jim ullatab Pami oma vanemate vana maja ostes. Ryan jatab Kelly maha, et sõita Taisse.

programme.title: Moodne perekond
programme.desc: Kunagi naabruskonnas elanud poisist saab interneti-miljardar ning Phil hakkab mõtlema, mis oleks võinud olla. Jay arvates peab Manny kuulma konstruktiivset kriitikat. Cameron on solvunud, kui Mitchell seab kahtluse alla ta lapsepõlve varvikad juhtumised. Tanupuhal jaguneb pere kaheks ja tuli otsustatakse lahendada kõrvitsaheitega.

programme.title: Moodne perekond
programme.desc: Pere koguneb Jay ja Gloria basseini aarde ja nad mõistavad, et kuna kõik on jõulude ajal laiali, peavad nad jõule sel paeval tahistama. Mitchell, Alex ja Lily peavad hankima kuusepuu, Jay ja Cameron pakivad kingitusi, Phil ja Manny ostavad suua, Gloria ja Luke hangivad jõulukaunistusi ning Claire ja Haley ostavad kingitusi.

programme.desc: Ainult 99. jaoskonna liikmed kutsutakse terrorismiõppusele. Holt pahandab, kui saab psuhholoogi juures Ginaga sama tulemuse. Jake uritab ikka Sophiast ule saada.

programme.title: Nadalalõpp Kanal 2ga
programme.desc: Mõnus meelelahutusaates raagivad põnevad kulalised lõbusaid lugusid, tehakse muusikat ja viiakse labi ullatavaid eksperimente. Saadet juhivad Teet Margna ja Kristjan Jõekalda.

programme.title: Elmar TV
programme.desc: Raadiost Elmar tuttav Eesti muusika kullafond ja ka varsked kodumaised hitid hoiavad Eesti Kanalis oositi tuju uleval. Nostalgitse või laula kaasa, kodumaiste muusikavideote paremik on eetris!

programme.title: Eesti Vabariigi humn
programme.desc: Eesti Vabariigi humn.

programme.title: Maahommik
programme.desc: Kevade võim ja vagi tahendab seda, et vaatame ilma jargi, mida teeme aias. Statistika andmetel muuakse kogu maailmas aastaringselt igal toopaeval iga 3,5 minuti jarel uks Massey Fergussoni traktor. Saatejuhid Silvia Karro ja Mati Kirotar.

programme.title: Eesti aja lood
programme.desc: Suveks linnast ara! Kuhugi, kus on puhas õhk, marjad ja rõõsk piim. Suvitamisest sai elustiili loomulik osa uhtedele ja sissetuleku allikas teistele. Eestis leidus nii tervisemuda kui puhast rannaliiva ja merevett ning natuke glamuuri ka!

programme.title: Sõber koer
programme.desc: Saade koertest, koerasõpradest ja sellest, et uksteist paremini mõista.

programme.title: Kadunud maailm
programme.desc: Kummekond aastat tagasi vahendas Peeter Võsa elu pahupoolt hittsaates "Politseikroonika". Vahepeal moodunud ajaga on meie uhiskond sedavõrd muutunud, et tollased kaadrid mõjuvad juba igaveseks kadunud maailmana.

programme.title: Ausalt, palun
programme.desc: Piret Tali stuudiokulaline on ooperilaulja Riina Airenne.

programme.title: Naabriplika
programme.desc: Ekraanil on Eesti varvikaima kula tegelased. Produtsendid Martin Algus ja Ergo Kuld. Režissoor Ergo Kuld.

programme.title: Pariselu lood
programme.desc: 17 miljonit britti andis oma haale lahkumiseks Euroopa Liidust. Kas maailma võimsaim kuningriik soostab vabalangusesse? Lahkumine ilma leppeta on tõenaolisem kui kunagi varem. Kas Suurbritannia kangelaslik labikukkumine on igatsus kadunud impeeriumi jarele?

programme.title: Mount Everest
programme.sub-title: Retk Katmandust Everesti lõunalaagrisse ja tagasi
programme.desc: Kuna Hiina võimud Tiibeti viisat ei andnud, siis otsustas vapper telemees runnata Everesti Nepali-poolsest kuljest. Üheksa paeva uletas mees ennast, et olla poolteist tundi 5400 meetri kõrgusel merepinnast. Autor Vahur Kersna, produtsent Raivo Suviste. Balti Video OÜ/ETV.

programme.title: Kook
programme.desc: Elu "Koogis" on midagi enamat, kui lihtsalt igav, sest pannid sarisevad, noad valguvad ja tunded keevad ule!

programme.title: 11 000 aastat hiljem
programme.desc: Eesti parlament sai endale vaarika parlamendihoone 1920. aastate algul, mis oli omal ajal moodne, ajastutapne, suursugune ja õiges kohas. Ka tana rõhutab see maja, kui tahtis on enesest lugu pidada, hoides meeles rahva poolt antud mandaati. Taasiseseisvunud Eesti parlamendil oli raske alustada, ent sajad seadused nõudsid ja ootasid tegemist. See ajajark on moodas. Mis on tanase parlamendi ulesanne olukorras, kus pettunud inimeste koor skandeerib umber maja? Kas ka tana esindab parlament meid kõiki - kogu rahvast? Kas parlament peaks olema kasvõi mõnes asjas uhtne, mangima sama teost ja alluma uhele dirigendile? Mis on õigupoolest teos, mida mangitakse ja mida peab tegema dirigent? Saate autor Indrek Treufeldt, režissoor Tarvo Molder, toimetaja Tiina Kaalep.

programme.title: Kalevipojad
programme.desc: Peremees Mauri on puhkama sõitnud ja mehed otsustavad seniks treilerist majja kolida, see tekitab aga hulga uusi pingeid. Mehed tulitsevad ja lisaks tuleb Antile ootamatu kulaline. Peretutar Pirkko leiab uue nipi, kuidas Indrekule laheneda ja seljavaluga võitlev Indrek peab tudruku eest põgenema. Indreku naine tutvub inimesega, kes teeb talle ullatava pakkumise. Indreku tutar Annabel ei tule ooseks koju ja mehe kodune elu muutub veelgi keerulisemaks.

programme.title: Evelin
programme.desc: Kuuel korral toob Evelin Ilves vaatajateni teemad, mis meid kõiki puudutavad ning eksklusiivsed vestlused mitmete tuntud eesti inimestega.

programme.title: Nadalalõpp Kanal 2ga
programme.desc: Mõnus meelelahutusaates raagivad põnevad kulalised lõbusaid lugusid, tehakse muusikat ja viiakse labi ullatavaid eksperimente. Saadet juhivad Teet Margna ja Kristjan Jõekalda.

programme.title: Maahommik
programme.desc: Lihavõttepuhade ajal tuleb juttu nii munadest kui sealihast. Saatejuht Mati Kirotar.

programme.title: Eesti aja lood
programme.desc: Riiklikult korraldatud spordiliikumisele pandi alus, kui Tartu rahu oli veel sõlmimata. 1920. aasta olumpiamangudel Antverpenis olid eestlased juba kohal ja medalid tulid. Kehakultuuri harrastamine tõusis uha enam ausse ja võisteldi ka kodumaal.

programme.title: Cafe Amigo
programme.desc: Saate salvestus toimub "Viru" hotelli kohvikus "Cafe Amigo", saadet juhivad Ivo Linna, Marko Reikop, Olavi Pihlamagi.

programme.title: Sõber koer

programme.title: Kadunud maailm
programme.desc: Kummekond aastat tagasi vahendas Peeter Võsa elu pahupoolt hittsaates "Politseikroonika". Vahepeal moodunud ajaga on meie uhiskond sedavõrd muutunud, et tollased kaadrid mõjuvad juba igaveseks kadunud maailmana.

programme.title: Naabriplika
programme.desc: Ekraanil on Eesti varvikaima kula tegelased. Produtsendid Martin Algus ja Ergo Kuld. Režissoor Ergo Kuld.

programme.title: Mount Everest
programme.desc: Labi hiinlaste poolt laastatud Tiibeti jõuavad eestlased maailma suurima mae jalamil asuvasse baaslaagrisse. Telklinnak karusel maastikul saab meie meestele koduks kaheks tuutuks kuid lootusrikkaks kuuks. Autor Vahur Kersna, montaažirežissoor Andres Lepasar, produtsent Raivo Suviste. Tootja BEC.

programme.title: Pariselu lood
programme.desc: Elo Mõttus-Leppik uurib, kas Eestis ja Euroopas on kaimas ideoloogiate sõda?

programme.title: Nadalalõpp Kanal 2ga
programme.desc: Mõnus meelelahutusaates raagivad põnevad kulalised lõbusaid lugusid, tehakse muusikat ja viiakse labi ullatavaid eksperimente. Saadet juhivad Teet Margna ja Kristjan Jõekalda.

programme.title: Evelin

programme.title: 11 000 aastat hiljem
programme.desc: Õigust on mõistetud tuhandeid aastaid - ka siin, Eestis. Meie praegune õigussusteem on kirju muster, milles vilksatab ka vaga iidseid põhimõtteid. Et siinsel pinnal valitses korraga mitu võimu, on kehtinud õiguski olnud erinev rikaste ulikute ja õigusteta talupoegade tarvis...

programme.title: Kalevipojad
programme.desc: Mehed hakkavad treilerit koristama ja kohtuvad karuga. Indrek saab teada, et tema naine kohtub võõra mehega ja satub ahastusse. Indreku tutrel Annabelil tekib koolis probleeme ja ta võõrdub uha rohkem ka kodusest elust. Kalevipojad saavad hetkeks tulidest ule ja toetavad teineteist, õhkkond muutub treileris hoolivamaks. Üle pika aja helistab Indrekule tema naine Maris, kuid ainult selleks, et halbu uudiseid oelda. Pinged hakkavad taas tuure ules võtma...

programme.title: Elmar TV
programme.desc: Raadiost Elmar tuttav Eesti muusika kullafond ja ka varsked kodumaised hitid hoiavad Eesti Kanalis oositi tuju uleval. Nostalgitse või laula kaasa, kodumaiste muusikavideote paremik on eetris!

programme.desc: Kaitsevõime, kaitsetahe ja Kaitsevagi on meil tihti kõneaineks. Kuidas olid lood relvade ja relvakandjatega Eesti jaoks kriitilisel ajal - 1938.-1939. aastal? Saate autor Mati Talvik, režissoor Indrek Kangur.

programme.desc: Kohanemine eluga Everesti jalamil on kõike muud kui meelakkumine. Sellest hoolimata pressib eestlaste ekspeditsioon end ules juba Põhjanõlvast, kui neid tabab tõsine tagasilook - Margus kukub keset liustikku kaheksa meetri sugavusse auku. Autor Vahur Kersna, kaamera Tõnis Lepik, montaažirežissoor Andres Lepasar, produtsent Raivo Suviste. Tootja BEC.
